alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 3:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Weakening thunderstorms with strong wind gusts will impact portions of southeastern Fremont and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 312 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Florence to 7 miles west of Pueblo Reservoir. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Pueblo Reservoir, Penrose and Pueblo West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
